sentences.english: Contributing to the funereal atmosphere is an enforced nocturnal darkness.
sentences.chinese: 对送葬的大气有助益是被运行的夜黑暗。

sentences.english: My fair skin didn’t help clarify matters either.
sentences.chinese: 我白皙的皮肤也于澄清事情毫无助益。

sentences.english: Their questions can help you diagnose your financial situation
sentences.chinese: 他们的问题会对你的财务状况的检查有所助益。

sentences.english: Some credit-market participants said the Fed’s moves would help somewhat.
sentences.chinese: 一些信贷从业人士表示，联储举动助益有限。

sentences.english: When the eyes droop face serious prejudice to the vision, treatment is usually helpful.
sentences.chinese: 当眼脸下垂严重到妨碍视力，则治疗通常是有助益的。

sentences.english: It’s a no-brainer that drinking coffee or tea right before you hit the sack won’t do you any sleep favors.
sentences.chinese: 睡前喝茶或是咖啡对睡眠没有任何助益。

sentences.english: This book contributes little to our understanding of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 此书对我们了解这门学科无所助益。

sentences.english: This lawyer’s skill is very useful to me as a reference librarian.
sentences.chinese: 律师的技巧对我做好法律图书馆员而言，大有助益。

sentences.english: Nice to know that Buddha helped and that your family felt the help.
sentences.chinese: 得知佛助及您的家人也感受到助益真好。

sentences.english: The agreement inures to the benefit of the employment .
sentences.chinese: 那协定对于受雇的人们有助益。

sentences.english: This is a great help for them to improve the quality of life.
sentences.chinese: 本系统对弱势团体在生活品质的改善方面助益甚大。

sentences.english: Singling out China-based firms wouldn't help.
sentences.chinese: 挑出中国为基地的公司不会有助益。

definition: bringing great benefits (idiom); very useful/of great service/to help greatly/to serve one well
to promote/to enhance/to further/to advance (a cause etc)
not be without some advantage/be of some help
to help one another/to come to sb's help
